Contact Us
CONTACT US
We look forward to hearing from you!
Call us at:
(352) 543-5285
Our mailing address is:
P.O. Box 309, Cedar Key FL 32625
Our physical address is:
510 3rd Street, Cedar Key FL 32625
Email Addresses:
John Rittenhouse:
jrittenhouse@ckwater.org
James McCain:
james@ckwater.org
Ann Richburg:
ann@ckwater.org
Alicia Johns:
alicia@ckwater.org
Or use the form below to send a message:
Your name
Your email

Governance
Recent Board Meetings
Past Board Meetings
Board Members
Laws
Transparency
Board Members
The Cedar Key Water and Sewer District is governed by a 5-member elected board.  Board members serve 2-year terms.
Joe Hand, Board Member
Leslie Sturmer, Board Member
Michael Borelli, Board Member
Johnathan Ferguson, Board Member
John Rittenhouse, General Manager
Board Members
The Cedar Key Water and Sewer District is governed by a 5-member elected board.  Board members serve 2-year terms.

Board Meetings
The District's governing board meets on the second Monday of each month at 5:00pm in the meeting room at 510 3rd Street, Cedar Key.
Materials relating to prior meetings may be found on the Resources page.

Find documentary resources including Laws, Meeting Packets, Minutes, Budgets, Audits, Annual Reports, and Articles.

About Us
About Us
The Cedar Key Water and Sewer District provides water and sewer services to the Cedar Key islands in Levy County, Florida. It is a special district operating under the authority of a charter granted by the Florida Legislature.  The District raises revenues by way of an ad valorem tax and charges for water and sewer services as authorized by its Charter. The District Board holds its regular meetings on the second Monday of every month at the District Offices, 510 Third Street, Cedar Key, Florida.
The District's service area is shown on the following map:
CKWSD Service Area.pdf

We look forward to hearing from you!
